text.text_translated: We looked at our results. We recommend Girox Foods. They should manage people in a way that helps them. Girox Foods should offer flexible working hours. Workers can choose their work times. They should also let workers choose where they work. Bosses must give workers tasks that make them think. Bosses must praise workers. They must show workers that their work is important. We should spend more money on training. This training helps workers improve their jobs. It helps them with social skills. It helps them talk with people from other countries. This makes a good place to work. Workers can do their best work there.

Our study shows this.
We recommend Girox Foods should use a management style that cares about people.
This style helps workers.
We should look for ways to give workers flexible hours.
Workers can also choose where they work.
Managers must give workers tasks to help them learn.
They must tell workers they do well.
They must show they like their work.
We should spend more money on training.
This helps workers do their jobs better.
It helps them talk with other people.
It helps them talk with people from different countries.
This helps make a good place to work.
Then workers can do their best work.
